articles.title: 'It's a great product...' Trump buys new 'red' Tesla with 'patriot' Musk at White House
articles.description: Washington DC: US President Donald Trump on Tuesday (Mar 11) purchased a gleaming red Tesla with Elon Musk, the CEO of the company, assisting him in selecting the car on the White House driveway. This purchase was seen as a gesture of support for Musk's electric vehicle company, which has been facing criticism due to the CEO's efforts to promote the President's political agenda. "Wow, that's beautiful," Trump remarked as he slid into the driver's seat of a Model X. Get in, patriots‚Äîwe have a country to save.üá∫üá∏@ElonMusk helps President Trump pick his new @Tesla! pic.twitter.com/VxdKMsOBjW ‚Äî The White House (@WhiteHouse) March 11, 2025 Elon Musk: ‚ÄúAs a function of the great policies of President Trump and his administration, and as an act of faith in America, Tesla is going to DOUBLE vehicle output in the United States within the next two years...‚Äù pic.twitter.com/g8jY77yxtP ‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) March 12, 2025 Number one, it's a great product, as good as it gets‚Äîand number two, because @ElonMusk has devoted his energy and his life to doing this and I think he has been treated very unfairly... pic.twitter.com/6qrfwrbT0f ‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) March 12, 2025 Musk, taking his seat in the passenger side, joked about "giving the Secret Service a heart attack" as they discussed how to start a vehicle that can accelerate to 95 kilometers per hour in just a few seconds. "When I saw what was happening, I said that I want to buy a Tesla and we just went to the front. He (DOGE Head and Tesla CEO, Elon Musk) had four beautiful cars there, and I bought one in front of the press. It was a very public purchase, and they're beautiful and do a great job," Trump told reporters. He added, "He's done a great job...It's not that he's a Republican... Sometimes, I'm not even sure what he is in terms of his philosophy, but he's a great guy. He's a patriot." Tesla shares have experienced a significant decline since the US election, as Elon Musk's growing political involvement and efforts to cut back the federal government have sparked widespread backlash.

articles.title: Wall Street sell-off spirals, briefly sends US stocks 10% below its record
articles.description: Wall Street's sell-off is spiralling Tuesday following President Donald Trump's latest escalation in his trade war, briefly pulling the US stock market 10% below its record set just a few weeks ago.The S&P 500 was down 1.4% in afternoon trading after Trump said he would raise tariffs on steel and aluminum coming from Canada, doubling their planned increase to 50%. The president said it was a response to moves a Canadian province made after Trump began threatening tariffs on one of the United States' most important trading partners.The Dow Jones Industrial Average was down 678 points, or 1.6%, as of 1:40 pm Eastern time, and the Nasdaq composite was 1% lower.The S&P 500 was sitting at the edge of what Wall Street calls a correction," where it falls 10%, and was sitting within 0.1 percentage points of the mark.Such head-spinning moves are becoming routine following a scary ride for investors where the S&P 500 has swung by at least 1%, up or down, seven times in the last .

articles.title: Education Department Faces Major Cuts Amid Trump's Cost-Cutting Mandate
articles.description: Education Department Faces Major Cuts Amid Trump's Cost-Cutting Mandate The U.S. Department of Education announced significant layoffs, intending to shed nearly half of its staff. This decision comes as part of President Donald Trump's broader initiative for mass layoffs across federal agencies, pressuring them to submit detailed layoff plans by the deadline.Secretary of Education Linda McMahon affirmed that these layoffs would likely lead to the department's dismantling, adhering to Trump's mandate. These cuts, part of a pattern followed by other agencies, highlight Trump's determined efforts to drastically reduce government expenditures and personnel.The move has sparked significant controversy within the administration, facing resistance from White House officials and Republican lawmakers. Union leaders and various agencies are negotiating early retirement options, hoping to meet Trump's stringent cost-cutting requirements without prompting legal challenges.

articles.title: Vibrant Elegance: Yves Saint Laurent's Paris Fashion Finale
articles.description: Vibrant Elegance: Yves Saint Laurent's Paris Fashion Finale Anthony Vaccarello, at the helm of French fashion giant Yves Saint Laurent, concluded Paris Fashion Week with a striking collection. His lineup included evening-ready minidresses in bold hues and sweeping gowns, showcased in a captivating nighttime display near the Eiffel Tower.Guests sat on dark leather seating, immersed in ambient pink lighting with marbled walls, as models strutted in statuesque silhouettes. The collection highlighted sharp tailoring over ornamentation, with colors ranging from fuchsia to teal.Celebrities like Bella Hadid showcased daring designs, alongside famous Parisian figures such as Betty Catroux and Catherine Deneuve, completing a star-studded front row at the climax of the illustrious fashion week.

articles.title: Greenland's Independence Quest Amid U.S. Scrutiny
articles.description: Greenland's Independence Quest Amid U.S. Scrutiny Polling stations in Greenland closed recently after a pivotal parliamentary election heightened by U.S. President Donald Trump's ambition to purchase the island. The election underscores debates over Greenland's independence, as high voter turnout extended voting past its scheduled close.The potential acquisition of Greenland, a semi-autonomous territory of Denmark, is viewed by Trump as crucial for U.S. security. As Arctic geopolitics heat up, the election has become a forum for assessing Greenland's stance amidst ambitions for autonomy.Greenland's election saw a surge in national pride, with pro-independence parties gaining momentum. Concerns over maintaining economic stability without Denmark, along with distrust towards Trump's intents, play heavily into the political discourse as Greenland navigates its future.

articles.title: EU's Controversial Plan to Process Migrants in Non-EU Return Hubs
articles.description: EU's Controversial Plan to Process Migrants in Non-EU Return Hubs The European Commission has introduced a contentious proposal allowing EU member nations to establish processing centers in non-EU countries for migrants with rejected asylum claims. These 'return hubs' are intended to expedite deportation proceedings, as the EU struggles with low compliance from those ordered to leave.The plan has sparked criticism, with rights groups raising alarms over potential human rights infringements. Amnesty International has condemned the move as capitulation to anti-migration sentiment, citing concerns over the potential for extended migrant detention.While the proposal aims to streamline deportation orders across the EU, its approval is pending from the European Parliament and member states, amid heightened sensitivities surrounding immigration within the bloc.

articles.title: Controversy Over USAID Document Shredding Sparks Legal Battle
articles.description: Controversy Over USAID Document Shredding Sparks Legal Battle The U.S. Agency for International Development faces legal action after officials allegedly ordered the shredding of numerous documents. This move prompted government employee unions to file a court motion requesting a halt on these activities, claiming it could interfere with ongoing legal cases against the agency's restructuring.According to court documents, USAID acting executive secretary Erica Carr instructed staff to prioritize shredding files, leaving burn bags as a contingency. Details on the specific records slated for destruction remain undisclosed, raising concerns over compliance with federal record-keeping laws, as well as preservation of evidence in legal suits.The unions, supported by multiple organizations, argue that Trump's administration overstepped its authority in downsizing USAID. As the legal contest unfolds, a federal judge has allowed the administration to proceed with some of its plans, despite ongoing resistance in other lawsuits against the government's aid allocation practices.

articles.title: Renewed Hopes for Jimmy Lai's Release Under Trump Administration
articles.description: Renewed Hopes for Jimmy Lai's Release Under Trump Administration The potential release of jailed Hong Kong media tycoon Jimmy Lai is gaining traction as U.S. President Donald Trump returns to office, his son asserted on Tuesday during a visit to Washington.Lai, who founded the now-shuttered Apple Daily newspaper, faces charges under China's national security law, a point of contention between the U.S. and China. Despite solitary confinement, the 77-year-old persists in his pro-democracy stance.Meetings with Trump administration officials, including State Department contacts, have been initiated, signaling hopeful developments. China disputes accusations regarding Lai's health. The White House and State Department have not responded to inquiries.

articles.title: Crisis on the Tracks: Pakistani Train Attack by Baloch Separatists
articles.description: Crisis on the Tracks: Pakistani Train Attack by Baloch Separatists In a brazen attack, separatist militants in southwestern Pakistan targeted a passenger train, taking dozens hostage in a bid to push their demands for independence. The militant group, Baloch Liberation Army (BLA), made explosive claims of hostage-taking and warned of dire consequences if their demands are not met.Authorities confirmed the train was en route from Quetta to Peshawar when militants blew up the tracks and opened fire. Security forces have engaged in a complex rescue operation, deploying helicopters and special forces amid challenging mountainous terrain. Over 100 hostages have been rescued thus far, according to officials.The militants demand the release of Baloch political prisoners and threaten to execute hostages if intervened upon militarily. With the situation escalating, Pakistani leaders condemn the attack as an act of terrorism designed to sow instability in the region, highlighting the ongoing conflict over Balochistan's resources.

articles.title: "Vibe Coding" Takes Center Stage as ICP Unveils Vision for Self-Writing Internet
articles.description: SINGAPORE, March 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- In a development that aligns perfectly with the surging popularity of "vibe coding"‚Äîthe emerging trend of creating applications based on feeling and intention rather than technical specifications, Dominic Williams the Chief Scientist of DFINITY Foundation has unveiled its vision for a self-writing internet powered by the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP). "Vibe Coding" Takes Center Stage as ICP Unveils Vision for Self-Writing Internet Riding the Wave of Intuitive Development As software development continues to evolve from rigidly structured coding to more intuitive approaches, ICP's announcement introduces a revolutionary concept where artificial intelligence autonomously creates and updates sovereign web applications through simple natural language commands. This approach transforms the traditional development process into a conversational experience, embodying the essence of the vibe coding movement. "Today's developers increasingly want to express what an application should feel like and what purpose it should serve, rather than getting lost in technical details," said Aaron Ting, ICP Hub Singapore representative. "Our self-writing internet vision takes this to its logical conclusion‚Äîallowing anyone to manifest digital experiences simply by describing them." The Self-Writing Internet: Beyond Traditional Development The vision introduces the concept of a self-writing internet that leverages ICP's unique technological infrastructure, particularly its smart contracts and Enhanced Orthogonal Persistence capabilities to enable AI systems to build fully functional web applications without traditional coding workflows. This approach would allow users to simply describe their desired application, with AI handling all aspects of development and deployment on ICP's secure, decentralized network. Unlike other blockchain platforms where AI is hosted off chain, the Internet Computer's architecture allows it to fully host AI in a canister smart contract, enabling direct interaction with and modification of applications it hosts. ICP's Enhanced Orthogonal Persistence‚Äîwhich enables seamless, enduring data storage distinct from traditional computing‚Äîcreates an environment where AI can function with unprecedented autonomy and efficiency. From Technical Specifications to Vibes: The Evolution of Development ICP Hub Singapore outlines a progressive roadmap for the self-writing internet with several key stages that mirror the evolution from technical to vibe-oriented development: Assisted Development: AI provides code suggestions and automates routine tasks while human developers maintain control over the development process. Collaborative Creation: AI generates complete functional components based on natural language descriptions, with humans providing feedback and direction. Autonomous Building: AI independently constructs entire applications from user specifications, handling everything from frontend design to backend logic. Continuous Evolution: Applications autonomously update and improve themselves based on usage patterns and user feedback, without requiring explicit human intervention. Ecosystem Integration: Self-writing applications begin to interact with each other, forming complex systems that evolve to meet users' changing needs. "The final stages of this evolution represent pure vibe coding‚Äîwhere users express their intentions and emotional goals, and software responds by creating itself to fulfill those aspirations," notes Ting. Building on a Foundation of Success This vision builds upon ICP's growing reputation as a developer-friendly ecosystem. In December 2024, ICP claimed the #3 spot among developer ecosystems, and in April 2024, ICP announced a $15 million Olympus Web3 accelerator to support innovation on the platform. Democratizing Digital Creation The long-term implications of this self-writing internet technology could be transformative, potentially democratizing application development by making it accessible to anyone with an idea, regardless of technical background. "We're not just talking about making development easier‚Äîwe're envisioning a paradigm shift where software writes itself based on human intent and emotional resonance," adds Ting. This vision represents ICP's commitment to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the decentralized tech landscape, positioning "vibe coding" as not just a trend but the future of software development. For more information about ICP Hub Singapore and its initiatives, visit www.icphubsg.com or follow @icphub_SG on social media. About ICP Hub Singapore ICP Hub Singapore is a leading advocate for the Internet Computer Protocol in Singapore and throughout Southeast Asia. The hub focuses on education, developer support, and ecosystem growth for ICP, often referred to as the "World Computer" for its ability to host secure, scalable web applications on a decentralized network. About the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) The Internet Computer Protocol is a decentralized computing platform that aims to extend the functionality of the internet by enabling developers to build and deploy secure, autonomous web applications and services without relying on traditional IT infrastructure. Reference: https://www.coindesk.com/opinion/2025/03/06/mass-adoption-of-web3-through-the-self-writing-internet

articles.title: Unity in Diversity: A Call for Mutual Brotherhood During Holi and Ramzan
articles.description: Unity in Diversity: A Call for Mutual Brotherhood During Holi and Ramzan As Holi aligns with the ongoing observance of Ramzan, Bahujan Samaj Party leader Mayawati has called on state governments to foster a climate of mutual brotherhood. She emphasized that this would be in everyone's interest, urging against political maneuvering during these festivities.Addressing the issue on the microblogging platform X, Mayawati highlighted the importance of honoring and respecting all religious communities equally. She cautioned that any form of political exploitation of this confluence would undermine social harmony.Furthermore, Mayawati insisted that officers prioritize maintaining law and order to ensure peaceful celebrations of both Holi and Ramzan. Such measures, she argued, would enhance mutual respect and camaraderie across diverse cultural and religious backgrounds.

articles.title: Fitch Ratings Boosts PNB's Viability Amidst Steady Growth
articles.description: Fitch Ratings Boosts PNB's Viability Amidst Steady Growth Fitch Ratings has affirmed the Punjab National Bank's (PNB) Long-Term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at 'BBB-' with a 'Stable' outlook. Meanwhile, the bank's Viability Rating (VR) has been upgraded to 'bb--' from 'b+', and its Government Support Rating (GSR) remains at 'B--'.The upgrade reflects ongoing improvements in PNB's risk profile and financial performance, which have exceeded Fitch's expectations. However, the agency warns that the bank's risk profile continues to be crucial, given its volatile history and moderate financial buffers.Fitch suggests that India's economic growth should bolster the ability of Indian banks, including PNB, to maintain profitable operations if they manage risks effectively. The bank has made strides in diversifying its loan mix, cleaning up bad loans, and limiting unsecured retail exposure, leading to an upward revision of its outlook on asset quality to positive from stable.The bank's impaired-loan ratio fell to 4.1% in the first nine months of 2024-25, down from 5.7% in the previous year, although it remains above the industry average. Punjab National Bank, India's second-largest public sector bank, boasts a vast network with over 51,000 touchpoints, including branches, ATMs, and business correspondents.

articles.title: Gaurav Gogoi Challenges Central Government's Approach in Manipur
articles.description: Gaurav Gogoi Challenges Central Government's Approach in Manipur Congress leader Gaurav Gogoi on Tuesday accused the central government of failing to bring peace to Manipur by force. He called on Prime Minister Narendra Modi to personally engage with the state's residents and hear their concerns.Initiating a discussion on financial matters related to Manipur, Gogoi highlighted the inadequacy of addressing the region's issues with a heavy hand and stressed the necessity for a political resolution. Gogoi questioned why Manipur's budget was not discussed within the state assembly due to President's Rule.Amid objections from BJP members about his focus on the Manipur situation, Gogoi emphasized the importance of listening to the aspirations and fears of the people. Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman and Speaker Om Birla addressed the absence of PM Modi, leading to a heated exchange about respecting former leaders.

articles.title: Ranya Rao gold smuggling case: DRI probes Dubai link, bitcoin scam network after arrest of bizman Tarun Raju
articles.description: Bengaluru: The gold-smuggling racket with the alleged involvement of Kannada actor Ranya Rao has taken a new turn with the Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) arresting her friend, Tarun K Raju, from a prominent business family in Bengaluru. Raju, who was with Ranya in Dubai, is suspected of facilitating the purchase of gold before handing it over to her. Also Read: Karnataka govt orders probe into IPS Ramachandra Rao's role in Ranya Rao gold smuggling case The DRI produced Raju before a judge, who remanded him in custody for four days. During his interrogation, investigators will try to determine how payments for the gold bars were made, whether through hawala or bitcoins. They'll also explore potential links between gold smugglers and the mastermind of a bitcoin scam involving children of businessmen and politicians, along with a hacker. Ranya, daughter of senior IPS officer Ramachandra Rao, was produced before a special court for economic offenses and remanded in judicial custody until March 24. The government has ordered a probe into the alleged misuse of police protocol services at Kempegowda International Airport (KIA), where Ranya was escorted by a constable while carrying 14.2kg of gold. The issue has sparked a war of words in the legislative assembly, with BJP MLA Sunil Kumar suspecting mafia and hawala operators' involvement in the racket. Home Minister G Parameshwara responded, stating that the case is handled by the DRI, which is under the central government's control. He added that the state government will investigate all aspects within its jurisdiction. BJP state president BY Vijayendra pointed out that Ranya had traveled abroad over 30 times in recent months, receiving full protocol arrangements each time, indicating she's not an ordinary individual. Parameshwara assured that the state government will investigate all aspects of the case. Also Read: Delhi court allows Christian Michel to apply for passport to meet bail conditions in AugustaWestland case

articles.title: Attukal Pongala 2025: Know date, time, significance of world's largest gathering of women devotees
articles.description: Thiruvananthapuram: Attukal Pongala, one of Kerala‚Äôs most prominent festivals, is scheduled for Thursday, March 13, 2025. This grand annual ritual honors Attukal Bhagavathy, the revered mother goddess, and takes place at the famous Attukal Bhagavathy Temple in Thiruvananthapuram. It is one of the largest gatherings of women devotees in the world. During this festival, millions of women gather to offer Pongala, a sweet dish made of rice, jaggery, coconut, and ghee, which they cook in earthen pots. The word "Pongala" means "to boil over," and it signifies prosperity and abundance. Women prepare this offering as an expression of their devotion to Attukal Amma, the goddess worshipped at the temple, who is considered an incarnation of Kannaki, a revered figure in Tamil and Kerala traditions. Attukal Pongala 2025: Date and Time Attukal Pongala - Thursday, March 13, 2025 Pooram Nakshathram Begins- 04:05 AM on Mar 13, 2025 Pooram Nakshathram Ends- 06:19 AM on Mar 14, 2025 Aduppuvettu (lighting of the hearth) at 10:15 AM. Pongala Nivedyam (offering) at 1:15 PM. Purathezhunnalethu rituals at 11:15 PM. March 14, 2025: The auspicious timing for the Kappazhikkal ritual will be at 10:00pm. March 15, 2025: The auspicious timing for the Kuruthi Tharpanam ritual will be at 1:00am. What is Attukal Pongala? Attukal Pongala is a renowned 10-day festival celebrated at the Attukal Bhagavathy Temple in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala. The festivities commence on the day when the Karthigai star appears in the Malayalam months of Makaram or Kumbham. The grand event concludes with Kuruthitharpanam, a sacred ritual involving symbolic sacrificial offerings performed at night. Attukal Pongala Mahotsavam The highlight of the 10-day festival is the ninth day, marked by the grand Attukal Pongala Mahotsavam. On this day, millions of women devotees assemble around the Attukal Bhagavathy Temple and line the streets of Thiruvananthapuram to prepare the sacred Pongala offering. This traditional dish, made from rice, jaggery, coconut, and ghee, is cooked in earthen pots as an act of devotion. It is widely believed that offering Pongala with sincere prayers brings divine blessings, prosperity, and the fulfillment of wishes.

articles.title: Massive Drone Assault Targets Moscow amid Ongoing Conflict
articles.description: Massive Drone Assault Targets Moscow amid Ongoing Conflict In an unprecedented escalation, Ukraine targeted Moscow in an extensive drone assault early Wednesday, marking the largest attack of its kind on the Russian capital since the war began. At least one person was killed, authorities confirmed, as the assault caused fires and significant transportation disruptions, grounding flights and halting train services in the region.The strike began around 4 a.m., with Moscow Region Governor Andrei Vorobyov reporting on a massive drone offensive via the Telegram messaging app. Moscow Mayor Sergei Sobyanin stated that at least 69 drones, approaching the city in successive waves, were neutralized. The attack resulted in severe damage, including the destruction of seven apartments and the evacuation of residents in the Ramenskoye district.The incident occurred as U.S. and Ukrainian officials were scheduled to engage in peace talks in Saudi Arabia, amidst ongoing efforts to negotiate an end to the war that commenced with Russia's 2022 invasion of Ukraine. Meanwhile, other nearby regions, including Ryazan and Belgorod, reported similar drone incursions, highlighting the conflict's continued intensity and widespread reach.

articles.title: Why Should A CA Get A Professional Loan?
creator: ABP Live Focus
articles.description: Chartered Accountants are professionals who provide specialised services. These professionals often require funds to expand their practice, invest in advanced technology, and upgrade their own skills. A professional loan for CAs can be a good option to fulfil these requirements.What Is a Professional Loan for Chartered AccountantsA professional loan for Chartered Accountants is particularly catered to strengthen professionals like CAs by providing competitive interest rates and flexible tenures. These collateral-free loans can particularly help CAs to purchase advanced technology that assists them in upgrading their services. The CA loan can also be utilised to upgrade or renovate office spaces and hire qualified staff.Why Should a CA Consider a Professional LoanSeveral benefits make a professional loan a viable financing option for CAs. Here are some key reasons why you might opt for one:Setting Up or Expanding a CA PracticeIf you plan to establish your own firm or expand an existing one, a professional loan can help cover:Office rental or purchaseFurniture and interiorsHiring qualified staffOperational expensesUpgrading Technology and SoftwareStaying updated with the latest accounting and taxation tools improves efficiency. A professional loan can fund:Advanced accounting software like Tally, QuickBooks, or cloud-based solutionsHigh-performance computing devices for faster processingCybersecurity solutions to safeguard client dataManaging Cash Flow and Working CapitalRegular expenses such as salaries, utilities, and office maintenance can strain your cash flow. A professional loan can help maintain financial stability and ensure smooth operations.Expanding Client Services and CertificationsUpskilling enhances your service offerings. You may require funds for:Certification courses like IFRS, forensic accounting, or data analyticsAttending industry seminars and workshopsSpecialised training for staffHandling Unexpected ExpensesFinancial emergencies such as sudden tax liabilities, legal expenses, or temporary business slowdowns can impact your liquidity. A professional loan ensures you have a safety net for such situations.Meeting Regulatory And Compliance CostsRunning a CA firm requires adherence to multiple regulatory requirements. A professional loan can cover:Licensing and renewal feesCompliance-related software upgradesAnnual filings and auditsBenefits Of A Professional Loan For CAsTaking a professional loan offers several advantages such as collateral-free loans and affordable interest rates: Here are some key benefits:No need to pledge property or assets as securityRepayment plans can be structured to match your cash flowTypically lower than personal loans due to the low-risk nature of CA businessesLenders consider CAs reliable borrowers, ensuring a hassle-free application processInterest paid on the loan can be claimed as a business expense, reducing taxable incomeHow To Apply For A Professional Loan?The application process for a professional loan is simple and can be done online. Here is a step-by-step guide:Check Eligibility CriteriaEnsure you meet the following eligibility criteriaYou must be a practising Chartered AccountantYou might have to fulfil certain income requirements, as per the lenderCollect Required DocumentsIdentity and address proof (Aadhaar, PAN, passport, etc.)CA certification and practice licenceFinancial documents (IT returns, profit and loss statements, bank statements)Business proof (GST registration, office lease agreement, etc.)Compare lenders by assessing interest rates, loan tenure, and processing fees. Also, check for repayment options and any hidden chargeSubmit the application online through the lender‚Äôs website or visit a branchWait for the approval. Once approved, the loan amount is disbursed to your bank account.Key Considerations Before Taking A Professional LoanBefore applying for a professional loan, assess these factors:Check the repayment capacity. Ensure that monthly instalments do not strain finances.Understand the loan terms. Read the agreement carefully, including prepayment penalties and processing fees.Compare multiple lenders before deciding the best dealUse the loan to improve practice and generate long-term growthA professional loan can be a good financial option for CAs looking to expand their practice, upgrade technology, or manage working capital. With collateral-free options, flexible repayment tenures, and tax benefits, this loan can support your professional growth and financial stability. Before applying, ensure the loan aligns with your business objectives and repayment capacity.Disclaimer: This article is a paid feature. ABP and/or ABP LIVE do not endorse/ subscribe to the views expressed herein. We shall not be in any manner be responsible and/or liable in any manner whatsoever to all that is stated in the said Article and/or also with regard to the views, opinions, announcements, declarations, affirmations, etc., stated/featured in the said Article. Accordingly, viewer discretion is strictly advised.

articles.title: NEP Showdown: BJP, DMK Clash Over Education Policy
articles.description: NEP Showdown: BJP, DMK Clash Over Education Policy BJP's spokesperson CR Kesavan criticized the DMK's opposition to the National Education Policy (NEP) on Tuesday, accusing them of fostering a 'discriminatory mentality' that harms students. Kesavan hailed the NEP 2020 as a progressive reform ensuring educational equality and empowerment, while labeling the DMK's educational model as divisive and regressive.Congress MP K Suresh also voiced concerns, slamming the central government for pushing the NEP without consulting state governments or academicians. He argued the policy aims to 'saffronise' the education system, opposing Tamil Nadu's resistance to the three-language policy imposed without their consent.Union Minister Dharmendra Pradhan added to the tensions, accusing the DMK of dishonesty and divisive politics. His comments sparked a backlash from Tamil Nadu's Chief Minister MK Stalin, who criticized Pradhan's 'arrogance' and alleged disrespect towards the Tamil people. The controversy led to a stalemate in parliamentary proceedings.

articles.title: TV Actress Aditi Sharma Accused of Cheating Just 6 Months After Secret Marriage
creator: ABP Live Entertainment
articles.description: New Delhi: Not even six months after secretly marrying her long-time lover, Abhineet Kaushik, 'Apollena' star Aditi Sharma is currently going through a messy separation. This information was made public when Abhineet, with the help of his lawyer Rakesh Shetty, discussed their secret marriage and the subsequent chaos.Aditi Sharma and Abhineet Kaushik reportedly had a secret wedding at their Goregaon residence on November 12, 2024, as reported by India Forums. The marriage was kept secret at Aditi's request.‚ÄúShe was after me to get married for the past one and a half years, but I wasn‚Äôt ready. After much persuasion, I agreed. However, she insisted that no one could know because marriage was a taboo in the industry,‚Äù Abhineet shared.As a legal advisor to the couple, Rakesh Shetty confirmed their marriage and shared photos from the wedding. He went on to say that Aditi and Abhineet rented a five-bedroom home together six months before their wedding, so they had been living together for a while before they tied the knot. However, the relationship soon turned turbulent. ALSO READ: Inside Shah Rukh Khan's Luxurious IIFA Suite, From Monogrammed Bedding To Nostalgic Film PortraitsCheating Allegations Against Aditi SharmaShortly after Aditi started shooting for ‚ÄòApollena‚Äô, Abhineet said that Aditi had developed feelings for Samarthya, one of her co-stars. Lawyer Rakesh Shetty said, "She was also beginning to shoot for her show Apollena at that time. Karishma, the producer of her show knew about it. Do you know Samarthya? She was dating him and Abhineet caught the two of them, that is when things took an ugly turn. That is when the legal team intervened."Additionally, Abhineet said that Aditi disputed the legal legitimacy of their marriage and treated it as a "mock trial" when questioned. Fans and the media are shocked by Aditi Sharma's abrupt and dramatic divorce since she has not addressed the accusations.

articles.title: Dongfeng powers a fuel-free journey from Wuhan to Harbin
articles.description: WUHAN, China, March 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- A report from Changjiang Daily. a global tour of the Dongfeng Motor Global Innovation Center On March 4, Han Yang, Director of the Technical Planning Center at Dongfeng Motor Corporation R&D Institute, led a global tour of the Dongfeng Motor Global Innovation Center. He showcased advancements in new energy and intelligent vehicle technology, reinforcing Dongfeng's role in shaping the future of mobility. This event, part of the "China Auto Valley ‚Ä¢ Global Launch of Wuhan-Made Auto Brands," featured the theme "Technological Dongfeng, Leading the Smart Future." It highlighted how Dongfeng translates innovation into user-focused products through its three major brands‚ÄîDongfeng Fengshen (AEOLUS), Dongfeng eœÄ, and Dongfeng Nammi. 300km in just 5 minutes The Quantum Architecture stands out as a cutting-edge intelligent electric vehicle framework. While most traditional EVs operate on a 400V system, Quantum Architecture upgrades to an 800V system, effectively turning a "narrow pipeline" into a "highway," enabling a rapid 5-minute charge to provide 300km of range. During the event, Han Yang pointed to a model and explained that conventional EVs house their battery packs externally, much like an "attached backpack." In contrast, Quantum Architecture has adopted an integrated design that seamlessly fuses the battery with the vehicle's floor, reducing battery thickness by 10mm, increasing vertical cabin space by an additional fist's height, and enhancing body rigidity by 30%‚Äîachieving both safety and comfort. The Quantum Architecture has already undergone rigorous road testing over 500,000km, enduring extreme conditions from -30¬∞C in Mohe to 50¬∞C in Turpan. Covering over 200 diverse terrains‚Äîincluding plateaus and gravel roads‚Äîit ensures a stable and reliable driving experience. World-Leading 47.06% thermal efficiency Engine thermal efficiency is a key benchmark for performance. "Traditional gasoline engines typically have a thermal efficiency of around 35%, but our Mach hybrid engine has achieved a global-leading 47.06%," Han Yang stated. Higher thermal efficiency translates to greater fuel savings and extended range. For example, hybrid models equipped with the i-Control intelligent power management system operate on pure electric mode in urban areas with zero fuel consumption, seamlessly switching to hybrid mode for highway driving. This results in an impressive range of over 2,000km‚Äîenough to drive from Wuhan to Harbin without refueling or recharging. As the powerhouse behind Dongfeng's vehicles, Mach Power has been a defining force since its debut in 2021. Ushering in a smarter mobility era Beyond power, a truly intelligent vehicle must "understand" its driver. "If a car were a human body, the engine and wheels would be its 'limbs,' while Tianyuan Architecture serves as its 'nervous system' and 'brain,'" Han Yang explained. This system boosts communication efficiency fourfold via fiber-optic transmission, enabling real-time hazard response. Moreover, Dongfeng's intelligent cockpit prioritizes emotional interaction. If a driver appears fatigued after work, the system automatically dims the lights, plays soothing music, and releases a lavender scent‚Äîtransforming the cabin into a "personalized spa space." Dongfeng's intelligent driving system effectively handles complex scenarios such as sudden pedestrian crossings and glare from oncoming headlights at night. For instance, if a pedestrian suddenly emerges from a blind spot, the system can detect, decide, and brake within just 0.02 seconds‚Äî10 times faster than human reflexes. An industry-first vehicle-road-cloud integration ensures seamless interaction between vehicles and infrastructure, providing accident alerts and syncing traffic signals to reduce sudden braking. Already deployed in multiple Chinese cities, these innovations reinforce Dongfeng's vision of a safer, smarter driving experience. Dongfeng's cutting-edge technologies are deeply intertwined with vehicle performance and user experience. Through technological empowerment, the company has built cars with a stronger "physique," a more powerful "heart," a smarter "brain," and a more responsive "nervous system."

articles.title: Japan Seeks Tariff Exemption from U.S.: No Promises Yet
articles.description: Japan Seeks Tariff Exemption from U.S.: No Promises Yet Japan's trade minister made a direct appeal to U.S. officials to exempt his nation from newly imposed trade tariffs, which include a 25% levy on steel and aluminum. However, discussions in Washington D.C. yielded no guarantees for exemption.During meetings with prominent U.S. officials including the Secretary of Commerce and the Trade Representative, Japan stressed its role as a significant economic partner. Japanese investments in the U.S., job creation, and economic contributions were highlighted as key reasons for seeking a tariff exemption.As the tariff enforcement date of March 12 looms, uncertainty remains. Talks also touched upon Japan's potential purchase of more U.S. liquefied natural gas and the involvement of Japanese firms in U.S. infrastructure projects and business acquisitions.

articles.title: Trump admin halts funding for 2 cybersecurity projects, including elections
articles.description: The Trump administration has cut millions of dollars in federal funding from two cybersecurity initiatives, including one dedicated to helping state and local election officials.The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency, known as CISA, has ended about $10 million in annual funding to the nonprofit Center for Internet Security, a CISA spokesperson said in an email Monday.It's the latest move by Trump administration officials to rein in the federal government's role in election security, which has prompted concerns about an erosion of guardrails to prevent foreign meddling in U.S. elections.CISA announced a few weeks ago that it was conducting a review of its election-related work, and more than a dozen staffers who have worked on elections were placed on administrative leave. That followed an administration move to disband an FBI task force focused on investigating foreign influence operations, including those that target U.S. elections.I have grave concern for .

articles.title: Hesai Selected by Top European OEM For Exclusive Multi-Year Lidar Contract On Its Next-Generation Global Platform
articles.description: PALO ALTO, Calif., March 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Hesai Technology (NASDAQ: HSAI), the global leader in lidar technology for automotive mobility and robotics applications, announced today a new exclusive design win with a leading European OEM. Hesai will provide advanced ultra-long-range automotive lidars for the OEM's upcoming platform, including both internal combustion engine (ICE) and electric vehicle (EV) models. This multi-year program will last into the next decade, marking it the largest global program for the automotive lidar industry. "This long-term partnership is a resounding endorsement of our unrivaled performance and quality. Meeting the rigorous standards of a market leader, our quality has become our namecard‚Äîa powerful symbol of excellence and a vote of confidence in our visionary future. We are immensely proud to empower the future of mobility, with our state-of-the-art lidar technology playing a pivotal role in conventional and electric vehicle platforms," said Hesai CEO and Co-Founder David Li. "This design win illustrates the importance of lidar technology for the future of advanced intelligent driving systems, helping to enhance safety, prevent accidents, and save lives." As of February 2025, Hesai has earned 120 design wins across 22 automotive OEMs. In December 2024, Hesai became the first lidar company in the world to deliver more than 100,000 units in a single month. About Hesai Technology Hesai Technology (Nasdaq: HSAI) is a global leader in lidar solutions. The company's lidar products enable a broad spectrum of applications including passenger and commercial vehicles ("ADAS"), as well as autonomous driving vehicles and robotics and other non-automotive applications such as last-mile delivery robots and AGVs ("Robotics"). Hesai seamlessly integrates its in-house manufacturing process with lidar R&D and design, enabling rapid product iteration while ensuring high performance, high quality and affordability. The company's commercially validated solutions are backed by superior R&D capabilities across optics, mechanics, and electronics. Hesai has established offices in Shanghai, Palo Alto and Stuttgart, with customers spanning more than 40 countries.

articles.title: Currencies Fluctuate Amid Trade Tension and Economic Slowdown Fears
articles.description: Currencies Fluctuate Amid Trade Tension and Economic Slowdown Fears The U.S. dollar faced a decline against the Japanese yen on Monday, driven by fears of an economic slowdown and ongoing uncertainty concerning the Trump administration's trade policies. Investors' mounting concerns were compounded by a notable selloff on Wall Street.While the greenback faltered against the yen, it showed resilience by strengthening against currencies like the euro, Swiss franc, and sterling, as traders took profits from recent currency gains. Meanwhile, Wall Street noted a steep decline, with a significant drop in the Nasdaq as tech sectors suffered.Interest rate movements were a focus, with U.S. rates falling, impacting the dollar's performance. The euro showed volatility, influenced by potential changes in European military spending. As investors adjust positions, attention turns to upcoming U.S. inflation data, which may signal future rate cuts by the Fed.

articles.title: Trade Wars Resurge: Trump's Tariff Turmoil Under Biden's Shadow
articles.description: Trade Wars Resurge: Trump's Tariff Turmoil Under Biden's Shadow Trade tensions are escalating, with former President Donald Trump and current President Joe Biden both utilizing tariffs in their international policy arsenals. Trump's renewed tariff threats, coupled with Biden's strategic measures against China, are reigniting global trade concerns.The two leaders, amid political rivalry, target key trading partners like China, Mexico, and Canada with sweeping tariff plans, creating uncertainty and potential economic reverberations worldwide. Businesses are revisiting investment strategies, amid depressed consumer confidence due to fluctuating tariff announcements.Global markets are on alert as the economic landscape becomes increasingly volatile. Both U.S. administrations seek to project strength against trade adversaries, with tariffs as the chosen tool, prompting analysts to warn about the downstream effects on global economies and consumer prices.

articles.title: Features Gaming and Betting with Krikya App in Bangladesh
articles.description: How to Register and Start Playing in Krikya Apps?Today, millions of Bangladeshis are into betting and gambling - this unique entertainment format helps the local audience to find different leisure options and simply have fun. At the same time, users emphasise mobile applications, as most of them use smartphones and tablets to access the Internet. Among the many projects, can be singled out Krikya apps - convenient and functional programs for Android and iOS devices with instant access to their favourite bets and games. Becoming a part of the gaming community is very easy - just read our article to understand all the nuances of registration and choosing the right activity. Getting to Know Krikya AppsMany gambling and betting enthusiasts in Bangladesh have already experienced the benefits of the mobile format after Krikya download. This convenient and productive programme is fully adapted to the needs and interests of the local audience. The software is designed to provide quick access to key features and suggestions from the project team from any device, including legacy models. The interface also adapts to different screen sizes and is accompanied by intuitive navigation. The main features of the Krikya app include:Sports betting - users can bet on cricket, football, tennis and other popular sports with a user-friendly interface and up-to-date odds;Online casinos and live games - a large selection of slots, table games and live casinos with real dealers are available on the app;Easy navigation - the intuitive interface allows you to quickly find the events and games you want, place bets and track results in real time;Fast deposits and payouts - the system supports popular payment methods in Bangladesh, including bKash and Nagad;Bonus offers - the app offers welcome bonuses, cashbacks and promotions for new and regular users. Download Krikya apps, can only be downloaded from the official website of the project, as it is not available on Google Play and App Store. The installation takes place manually through downloading the APK file. After installation, users can register, make a deposit and start betting in a convenient mobile format.Registration in Krikya AppSigning up for Krikya apps is a quick and easy process that only takes a few minutes. But if you are new to betting and gambling use the step-by-step instructions:Go to the official website of the Krikya project - at the top of the start page there are basic tools for authorisation or registration;Click on the "Register" button - after that you will be redirected to the registration form, where you will have to provide your real personal data; Fill out the registration form - users will be asked to fill out a form with personal information that includes real first name, last name, email address, phone number and password;Confirm your registration - after completing the form, you will likely receive an email to the email address provided with a registration confirmation link that you must click on to activate your account.Log in - you can now log in using your username and password.Next, you need to make a deposit using any of the presented methods for a comfortable amount, taking into account the minimum limit. Beginning of GameplayAfter successfully registering and depositing, the user is presented with all the gaming features, as well as many options for betting on a wide variety of sports. Here's what you need to do:Choose a game or market to bet on - in the 's gaming and sports cataloguedifferent formats of slots, card games and other variations of activities are available , so every user will be able to find an activity they enjoy;Krikya appMake a deposit - to play for real money, you need to make a deposit to your account, so the Krikya project team usually offers various payment methods such as bank cards or e-wallets;Play and enjoy - bet on different sports and events, and don't forget to keep track of your losses and wins. Next, let's look at other options that will be useful for beginners. Security and PrivacySecurity and data privacy are the most important aspects when choosing a mobile app for betting and gambling. Like many other trustworthy projects, the developers of Krikya app use modern encryption technologies to protect user data. However, it is always important to make sure that your password is secure and not to share sensitive information with third parties.Special Offers Many projects in Bangladesh, including Krikya, offer bonuses and promotions for new and regular users. These may include sign-up bonuses, free spins or other attractive offers. Keep an eye on the promotions section of the website so that you don't miss out on lucrative offers.Additional Tips for BeginnersIf you're new to sports betting and online casino games, here are some universal tips to help you get started as comfortably and safely as possible. Familiarise Yourself with the Rules of the GamesBefore you start playing for real money, familiarise yourself with the rules and strategies of the games you are interested in. Many activities have demo modes where you can test the functionality and gameplay without the risk of losing your own money. Manage Your BankrollStart your budget planning by setting limits on your bets and don't exceed them to avoid financial problems. Also, don't use funds for betting and gambling that you are afraid of losing. Use the BonusesDon't miss the opportunity to use bonuses and promotions that can increase your chances of winning. But keep in mind the wagering requirements in order to correctly withdraw funds in case of a win.Play ResponsiblyRemember that gambling should be fun, not stressful or financially challenging. Set limits on the length of gaming sessions and deposits, take self-diagnostic tests, and seek help at the first sign of gambling addiction. Following these tips and guided by simple registration steps, you will be able to enjoy playing and betting in the Krikya app catalogue and get the most out of the process. But remember to play safely and responsibly to avoid getting into risky situations.

articles.title: Lok Sabha to Deliberate on Manipur and Key Discussional Matters
articles.description: Lok Sabha to Deliberate on Manipur and Key Discussional Matters The Lok Sabha will engage in a one-hour discussion regarding the statutory resolution approving the proclamation of President's Rule in Manipur, following a decision by its Business Advisory Committee (BAC), led by Speaker Om Birla.Additionally, the House will discuss Manipur's budget, presented by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, beginning Tuesday. This discussion will be combined with the second batch of Supplementary Demands for Grants for 2024-25 and Excess Grants for 2021-22, with six dedicated hours.The BAC cancelled the March 13 sitting for Holi, rescheduling it to March 29. Ten hours have been allocated for Railway discussions, while separate days will focus on the Demands for Grants of the Jal Shakti and Agriculture Ministries, with eight hours for the Finance Bill. The committee has also empowered the speaker to select two additional ministries for discussion.

articles.title: ED Team Attacked In Chhattisgarh‚Äôs Bhilai After Raid On Former CM Bhupesh Baghel‚Äôs Son
creator: Varun Jain
articles.description: A team of the Enforcement Directorate (ED) was attacked in Bhilai, Chhattisgarh, on Monday (10 August) following searches at the residence of former Chief Minister and Congress leader Bhupesh Baghel. The attack occurred as ED officials were leaving Baghel‚Äôs house after conducting raids in connection with an alleged liquor scam involving his son, Chaitanya Baghel. According to sources, as the ED team stepped out, a group of people launched an attack, pelting stones at their vehicle. Large stones were reportedly thrown at the front and rear of the ED team‚Äôs car. However, no information on injuries has been confirmed so far. ED‚Äôs Action Against Chaitanya Baghel The ED conducted searches at multiple locations linked to Chaitanya Baghel under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA). News agency PTI reported that raids were carried out at Chaitanya Baghel‚Äôs premises in Bhilai, along with those of his alleged close associate, Laxmi Narayan Bansal alias Pappu Bansal, and several others. Chaitanya Baghel resides with his father in Bhilai, and the agency suspects he is a recipient of the proceeds of crime from the liquor scam. The ED has alleged that the Chhattisgarh liquor ‚Äòscam‚Äô caused massive revenue losses to the state, with over ‚Çπ2,100 crore allegedly pocketed by beneficiaries of the liquor syndicate. Following the raids, several Congress leaders and party workers gathered outside Bhupesh Baghel‚Äôs residence, alleging a political vendetta by the central government. They claimed the raids were orchestrated by the BJP to target opposition leaders. 'ED Found ‚Çπ32-33 Lakh Cash In My House, Not A Big Thing': Bhupesh Baghel On RaidReacting to the ED raids, Bhupesh Baghel accused the BJP of ‚Äúfrustration‚Äù and claimed the action was an attempt to silence him after he was appointed Congress‚Äôs in-charge for Punjab. Speaking to reporters, Baghel said, ‚ÄúThe ED found ‚Çπ32-33 lakh cash in my house, which is not a big thing. I have a big family and we do farming on 140 acres, apart from other sources of income. We will provide all details.‚Äù He further alleged that the ED had not found anything significant apart from documents related to cases concerning BJP leaders. ‚ÄúThe investigation into the liquor scam has been ongoing for three years, yet they (ED) have neither filed a final report nor framed charges,‚Äù he said. Baghel also linked the ED‚Äôs action to his recent questioning of the Chhattisgarh government in the state assembly. ‚ÄúI asked Deputy Chief Minister Vijay Sharma about the housing scheme for the poor during the budget session, and just within four days, the ED arrived at my residence,‚Äù he alleged. He claimed that the BJP‚Äôs frustration had intensified after he was acquitted by a special CBI court in Raipur in a seven-year-old case. ‚ÄúBecause of these two reasons, BJP is very much frustrated,‚Äù he alleged. The ED has yet to issue an official statement on the attack against its team in Bhilai. Meanwhile, the agency is expected to register a case regarding the incident.(With PTI Inputs)

articles.title: Biden‚Äôs use of autopen for executive orders sparks legal and cognitive concerns
articles.description: A recent investigation revealed that former US President Joe Biden used identical autopen signatures on multiple executive orders, raising concerns about his awareness of the policies he authorised. Critics argue this could render the orders unconstitutional. The DOJ has been urged to investigate whether staff exploited Biden‚Äôs cognitive decline to push policies without his direct approval.
